abilities.name: Leadership
abilities.effect: Your Basic Pokémon's attacks do 30 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

abilities.name: Nest Stash
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may shuffle your hand and put it on the bottom of your deck. If you put any cards on the bottom of your deck in this way, draw a card.

abilities.name: Trap Territory
abilities.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon's Retreat Cost is {C} more.

attacks.name: Wire Hang
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 more damage for each {C} in your opponent's Active Pokémon's Retreat Cost.

attacks.name: Raging Claws
attacks.effect: This attack does 10 more damage for each damage counter on this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Bright Flame
attacks.effect: Discard 2 {R} Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Tyrannical Tail
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon already has any damage counters on it, this attack does 180 more damage.

attacks.name: Energy Crush
attacks.effect: This attack does 50 damage for each Energy attached to all of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Pulse Launcher
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 30 damage to itself.

abilities.name: Tandem Unit
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may search your deck for up to 2 Basic {L} Pokémon and put them onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Photon Blaster
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

abilities.name: Psychic Embrace
abilities.effect: As often as you like during your turn, you may attach a Basic {P} Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your {P} Pokémon. If you attached Energy to a Pokémon in this way, put 2 damage counters on that Pokémon. You can't use this Ability on a Pokémon that would be Knocked Out.

attacks.name: Miracle Force
attacks.effect: This Pokémon recovers from all Special Conditions.

attacks.name: Everlasting Darkness
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, they can't play any Item cards from their hand.

attacks.name: Poltergeist
attacks.effect: Your opponent reveals their hand. This attack does 60 damage for each Trainer card you find there.

attacks.name: Bedrock Breaker
attacks.effect: Discard a Stadium in play.

attacks.name: Gigantic Tusks
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 50 damage to itself.

abilities.name: Dino Cry
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may attach up to 2 Basic {F} Energy cards from your discard pile to your Basic {F} Pokémon in any way you like. If you use this Ability, your turn ends.

attacks.name: Wild Impact
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

attacks.name: Nasty Plot
attacks.effect: Search your deck for up to 2 cards and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Toxic Ripper
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned. During Pokémon Checkup, put 6 damage counters on that Pokémon instead of 1.

attacks.name: Triple Laser
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 damage to 3 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Cybernetic Wheels
attacks.effect: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Maddening Scent
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 more damage for each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Heavy Stomp
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, during your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

cards.name: Arven
cards.effect: Search your deck for an Item card and a Pokémon Tool card, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Jacq
cards.effect: Search your deck for up to 2 Evolution Pokémon, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Katy
cards.effect: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Then, draw 8 cards. Your turn ends.

cards.name: Miriam
cards.effect: Shuffle up to 5 Pokémon from your discard pile into your deck. If you shuffled any cards into your deck in this way, draw 3 cards.

cards.name: Penny
cards.effect: Put 1 of your Basic Pokémon and all attached cards into your hand.

cards.name: Professor's Research
cards.effect: Discard your hand and draw 7 cards.

cards.name: Professor's Research
cards.effect: Discard your hand and draw 7 cards.

cards.name: Team Star Grunt
cards.effect: Put an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon on top of their deck.

cards.name: Nest Ball
cards.effect: Search your deck for a Basic Pokémon and put it onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Rare Candy
cards.effect: Choose 1 of your Basic Pokémon in play. If you have a Stage 2 card in your hand that evolves from that Pokémon, put that card onto the Basic Pokémon to evolve it, skipping the Stage 1. You can't use this card during your first turn or on a Basic Pokémon that was put into play this turn.
